Articles.Content:
Premise

After so many trips into space, the brave Jebediah decided to sit down and write an autobiography, the result was 'The book of Jeb'. This book had many helpful bits of information about orbital resonances in an appendix. This plugin makes it convenient to get this orbital data.

Download

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/39327895/ksp/book_of_jeb.zip

https://github.com/Tuqz/book_of_jeb

The mesh and texture are courtesy of 'Wazubaba' and has released them under the same license as my source code, hence the license for his mesh and texture is as above, except copyrighted to him, not me.

Screenshots

None at the moment.

Changelog

Version 0.21: Improved formulae

Version 0.2: Updated to KSP 0.22

Version 0.11: Corrected errornous strings.

Version 0.1: Added harmonics (1:3, 1:2, 2:3, 3:2, 2:1, 3:1) other than 1:1.

Edited November 9, 2013 by Tuqz
So, this makes it possible to get the information ingame?

Indeed! Although you can't get this sort of information else where at the moment, that I'm aware of other than via direct computation - although the maths is relatively simple, and the formulas needed are readily available.

Edited November 9, 2013 by Tuqz
Suggestions on where to put this in the tech tree are appreciated... 0.22 is imminent after all.
